mng: concubine, I, your servant (deprecatory self-reference for women)

exm.mng: wives and concubines (of a polygamous man), harem
(literary) I, your servant (self-appellation of a lower-rank female), (archaic) male and female slaves, subjects (of a ruler)
favor the concubine and do away with the wife (idiom), spoil one's mistress and neglect one's wife
